meta.title: Iryna Panasiuk | Fullstack Developer Portfolio
meta.description: Portfolio of Iryna Panasiuk, a Fullstack Developer specializing in modern web technologies. Explore projects in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more.

hero.title: Hello, I am Fullstack developer
hero.text: I am looking for opportunities for professional growth and am ready to join interesting projects where I can apply my skills.

about_me.story_text: I'm Ira, and my journey into the world of web development began with a simple curiosity: how are the websites we use every day created? This curiosity grew into a real passion. After completing intensive courses in full-stack development, I realized that this is exactly what I want to do. I am fascinated by the whole process: from the first idea to the finished product that users can see and feel.
about_me.inspiration_text: The opportunity to combine creativity with technology. Every project is a new challenge, a new opportunity to learn something interesting and create something useful. As a full-stack developer, I understand the importance of every detail - from page loading speed to intuitive interface. I strive to create not just websites, but digital experiences that are memorable.
about_me.open_to_projects: Always open to new projects and opportunities for professional growth!

my_projects.money_guard_desc: This is a comprehensive personal finance management application that helps users track their income, expenses, and manage their budget effectively. The application provides a modern, intuitive interface for financial planning and transaction monitoring.
my_projects.phonebook_app_desc: This is a full-stack phonebook application that allows users to manage their contacts efficiently. The application provides a clean, intuitive interface for adding, editing, deleting, and searching through contacts.
my_projects.learn_lingo_desc: This is a modern web application for a company that provides online language learning services with professional tutors. The platform connects students with experienced language teachers, offering personalized learning experiences across multiple languages and skill levels.
my_projects.project_code_samurai_desc: This is a modern web application for personal finance management, developed by the CodeSamurai team. This repository contains the client-side part of the project with an intuitive interface for tracking income, expenses, and analyzing financial status.
my_projects.nodejs_mongodb_desc: This project is a Node.js application built with MongoDB as part of homework assignments for learning backend development. The application demonstrates core concepts of building RESTful APIs using modern Node.js technologies.
my_projects.react_typescript_search_desc: This is a modern web application built with React and TypeScript, demonstrating type-safe development practices. This project showcases the integration of TypeScript with React to create robust, maintainable applications with enhanced developer experience and runtime reliability.
my_projects.phonebook_auth_desc: This is a full-featured React application that combines contact management with user authentication. This project represents the culmination of React learning, demonstrating advanced concepts like private routing, user session management, and secure API integration.
my_projects.react_movies_desc: This is a movie search and information application developed as homework assignment #5 for the React course at GoIT. The project demonstrates working with React Router, dynamic component imports (code splitting), and integration with The Movie Database (TMDB) API.
my_projects.fullstack_portfolio_desc: This is a professional portfolio website for fullstack developer Lloyd Jefferson, created by SurvivorsTeam13 as an educational project. The website showcases the developer's skills, experience, and projects in a modern and attractive design.
my_projects.image_search_desc: This is a web application for image search, developed as part of JavaScript homework assignment #12 at GoIT. The application allows users to search for images by keywords and load additional results using the Load more button.
my_projects.simply_chocolate_desc: This is a premium chocolate company website showcasing artisanal chocolate products, production processes, and customer experiences. This fully responsive website demonstrates modern web development techniques with a focus on user experience and visual appeal.
my_projects.mobileapp_prototype_desc: This is a comprehensive mobile application prototype showcasing modern mobile development concepts and user experience design. This project demonstrates a full-featured mobile app landing page with detailed feature presentations, team showcases, and customer testimonials.
my_projects.yachtjet_desc: This is a premium luxury yacht rental platform that offers an exclusive selection of high-end yachts for unforgettable maritime adventures. This project showcases a sophisticated booking system with detailed yacht specifications and customer testimonials.
my_projects.webstudio_desc: This is a modern, responsive business portfolio website that showcases effective solutions for businesses. The project demonstrates professional web development skills with a focus on clean design, user experience, and modern web technologies.

work_together.article: Contact me to transform your ideas into exceptional solutions.
work_together.modal_title: Thank you for your interest in cooperation!
work_together.modal_text: The manager will contact you shortly to discuss further details and opportunities for cooperation. Please stay in touch.
